thread.title: Sudan: Summit of Great Green Wall Approved Decision Calling for Lifting Sanctions Imposed On Sudan
thread.title_full: Sudan: Summit of Great Green Wall Approved Decision Calling for Lifting Sanctions Imposed On Sudan

title: Sudan: Summit of Great Green Wall Approved Decision Calling for Lifting Sanctions Imposed On Sudan
text:
Uganda: I Have Been Fighting Greedy People - Museveni 
Nouakchott — The Third Summit of the Heads of State and government of the African Great Green Wall Agency approved by the end of its meeting Monday evening in Nouakchott, Mauritania, a decision which calls for lifting all forms of the sanctions and the embargo imposed on Sudan. 
In a statement to SUNA, the Minister of Environment and Physical Development, Dr. Hassan Abdul-Gadir Hilal, said that the summit decided establishment of the African Carbon Bank with its headquarters in Khartoum. 
He said that the bank will provide funding for the Great Green Wall countries, the international carbon trade and the cultivation of trees. 
Dr. Hilal said that the summit decided formation of a Khartoum-based a technical committee of experts which will hold its first meeting in next September. Sudan
